Front: Create a Pod named nginx with image nginx
Create a Deployment named web with nginx image and 3 replicas
Update deployment web to use nginx:1.20 image
Rollback deployment web to previous version
Check rollout status of deployment web
Create a Job named pi that calculates pi
Back: kubectl create job pi --image=perl -- perl -Mbignum=bpi -wle 'print bpi(2000)'

Front: Create a CronJob that runs every minute
Back: kubectl create cronjob hello --image=busybox --schedule='*/1 * * * *' -- echo hello

Front: Expose deployment web as NodePort service on port 80
Create a Service named my-service for pods with label app=web
Create a ConfigMap named config from literal values
Create a ConfigMap from a file
Create a Secret named mysecret with username and password
Create a Pod that uses ConfigMap as environment variables
Back: kubectl run pod --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add: envFrom: - configMapRef: name: config

Front: Create a Pod with environment variable from Secret
Back: kubectl run pod --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add env from secret

Front: Get logs from specific container in Pod
Port forward to access Pod locally
Get detailed information about a Pod

Back: kubectl run nginx --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add: resources: limits: memory: 128Mi, cpu: 500m
kubectl run nginx --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add securityContext: runAsUser: 1001

Front: Create NetworkPolicy to deny all ingress
Back:
kubectl create -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  name: deny-all
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes: ["Ingress"]
EOF
kubectl run app --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add initContainers
kubectl run app --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add second container
kubectl run app --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add volumes and volumeMounts

kubectl create -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  name: my-pvc
spec:
  accessModes: ["ReadWriteOnce"]
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 1Gi
EOF
kubectl run app --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add PVC volume
kubectl run app --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add readinessProbe
kubectl run app --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add livenessProbe
kubectl create job batch --image=busybox --dry-run=client -o yaml > job.yaml\n# Edit to add completions: 3
kubectl create job parallel --image=busybox --dry-run=client -o yaml > job.yaml\n# Edit to add parallelism: 2

kubectl create -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: fluentd
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: fluentd
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: fluentd
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: fluentd
        image: fluentd
EOF

kubectl create -f - <<EOF
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: web
spec:
  serviceName: nginx
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: nginx
        image: nginx
EOF
kubectl run app --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add nodeSelector
kubectl run app --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add affinity rules
kubectl run app --image=nginx --dry-run=client -o yaml > pod.yaml\n# Edit to add tolerations
